00048   public function testGetMatches() {
00049     // Test root element:
00050     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?><test><inside/>Text<inside/></test>';
00051     $doc = new DomDocument();
00052     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00053     
00054     // Test handing it a DOM Document
00055     $handler = new BottomUpCssEventHandler($doc);
00056     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00057     $this->assertTrue(count($matches) == 1);
00058     $match = $matches[0];
00059     $this->assertEquals('test', $match->tagName);
00060 
00061     // Test handling single element
00062     $root = $doc->documentElement;
00063     $handler = new BottomUpCssEventHandler($root);
00064     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00065     $this->assertEquals(1, count($matches));
00066     $match = $matches[0];
00067     $this->assertEquals('test', $match->tagName);
00068     
00069     // Test handling a node list
00070     $eles = $doc->getElementsByTagName('inside');
00071     $handler = new BottomUpCssEventHandler($eles);
00072     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00073     $this->assertEquals(2, count($matches));
00074     $match = $matches[0];
00075     $this->assertEquals('inside', $match->tagName);
00076     
00077     // Test handling an array of elements
00078     $eles = $doc->getElementsByTagName('inside');
00079     $array = array();
00080     foreach ($eles as $ele) $array[] = $ele;
00081     $handler = new BottomUpCssEventHandler($array);
00082     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00083     $this->assertEquals(2, count($matches));
00084     $match = $matches[0];
00085     $this->assertEquals('inside', $match->tagName);
00086   }
00087   
00088   public function testElement() {
00089     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?><test><inside id="first"/>Text<inside/></test>';
00090     $doc = new DomDocument();
00091     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00092 
00093     // Basic test
00094     $handler = new BottomUpCssEventHandler($doc);
00095     $handler->find('inside');
00096     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00097     $this->assertEquals(2, count($matches));
00098     $match = $matches[0];
00099     $this->assertEquals('inside', $match->tagName);
00100     
00101     $doc = new DomDocument();
00102     $doc->loadXML($this->xml);
00103 
00104     // Test getting nested
00105     $handler = new BottomUpCssEventHandler($doc);
00106     $handler->find('div');
00107     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00108     $this->assertEquals(3, count($matches));
00109     $match = $matches[0];
00110     $this->assertEquals('div', $match->tagName);
00111     $this->assertEquals('one', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00112     
00113     // Test getting a list
00114     $handler = new BottomUpCssEventHandler($doc);
00115     $handler->find('li');
00116     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00117     $this->assertEquals(10, count($matches));
00118     $match = $matches[0];
00119     //$this->assertEquals('div', $match->tagName);
00120     $this->assertEquals('li-one', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00121     
00122     // Test getting the root element
00123     $handler = new BottomUpCssEventHandler($doc);
00124     $handler->find('html');
00125     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00126     $this->assertEquals(1, count($matches));
00127     $match = $matches[0];
00128     $this->assertEquals('html', $match->tagName);
00129   }
00130   
00131   public function testElementId() {
00132     // Test root element:
00133     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?><test><inside id="first"/>Text<inside/></test>';
00134     $doc = new DomDocument();
00135     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00136     
00137     $handler = new BottomUpCssEventHandler($doc);
00138     $handler->find('#first');
00139     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00140     $this->assertEquals(1, count($matches));
00141     $match = $matches[0];
00142     $this->assertEquals('inside', $match->tagName);
00143     
00144     // Test a search with restricted scope:
00145     $handler = new BottomUpCssEventHandler($doc);
00146     $handler->find('inside#first');
00147     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00148     $this->assertEquals(1, count($matches));
00149     $match = $matches[0];
00150     $this->assertEquals('inside', $match->tagName);
00151     
00152   }
